Thus, \\( \\hat{y}(\\omega) = \\hat{s}(\\omega) \\cdot \\hat{h}(\\omega) \\), demonstrating that the effect on the output in the frequency domain is a direct multiplication of the transformed inputs, consistent with the convolution theorem.
